about_the_game:
About the Game
Step into the battlefield of Cube Arena, a unique first-person MOBA designed for both PC and VR players. Experience the intensity of a team-based strategy game with a fresh perspective, where precision, strategy, and quick reflexes are your key to victory.

Features:

  • First-Person Combat
    Take control of your hero in the heat of battle, whether you're playing on PC with a keyboard and mouse or diving into immersive VR combat with motion controllers.

  • Melee Class and Diverse Arsenal
    Start your journey with a powerful melee hero. Wield a variety of weapons, each with unique effects and playstyles, and use potions to gain an edge in combat.

  • Strategic Purchases
    Explore the battlefield and visit strategically placed shops to buy powerful items, weapons, and consumables that can turn the tide of battle.

  • Teleportation Mechanics
    Master the art of positioning with the teleportation scroll, allowing you to quickly traverse the map or escape sticky situations.

  • Inspired by the Classics
    Fans of Dota 2 and League of Legends will find familiar strategic elements, reimagined in a first-person perspective to deliver a fresh, immersive experience.

How Will You Play?
Will you charge into battle with raw strength, outsmart your opponents with clever purchases, or use teleportation to outmaneuver your enemies? Choose your strategy, master your hero, and dominate the Cube Arena.

Add Cube Arena to your wishlist now and be among the first to experience the next evolution of MOBA gameplay!

short_description: Cube Arena is a first-person MOBA where you fight on the battlefield yourself! Choose your weapons use unique skills, and buy useful items during the match to gain an advantage over your opponent. Play in VR by swinging your hands or on PC with a keyboard and mouse. Are you ready for battle?
